params._calldata: The receiving domain encoded message data.
params._receiver: The L1 contract address who will receive the calldata

OutboxMessage(address,bytes32,bytes).notice: The bridgers need to watch for these events and relay the messageHash on the FastBridgeReceiver.

sendFast(address,bytes).notice: Sends an arbitrary message from one domain to another via the fast bridge mechanism TODO: probably needs some access control either on the sender side or the receiver side
